backend/main.mo: Defines the actor with storage, authorization, and data models for files, folders, notes, missions, tasks, health checks, and diagnostics.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries detailing mission task toggle fixes, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing creation of a draft baseline synced exactly to Live version 114 with validation steps and change‑control rules.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting meta tags, PWA config, icons, and service worker registration.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Explains the post‑restoration freeze policy prohibiting changes until explicit user approval after restoring Live v114.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, and offline fallback logic.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Guide outlining steps to verify Chrome PWA installability including manifest, icons, service worker, and troubleshooting.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying that the frontend fully matches Live version 114 across authentication, UI, components, styling, and utilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring providers and intro logic around the HomePage.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component displaying classified actor initialization errors with retry and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: React component rendering an SVG target-style animated gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Displays a fixed bottom horizontal line used as a decorative UI separator.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file cannot be opened in a new window, offering retry and download actions.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog for previewing files with support for images, videos, PDFs, Office docs, and file actions like delete or move.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles uploading files, creating links or notes, and integrates speech-to-text and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders view, displaying a folder icon and label.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated dialog for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders with swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full-screen folders manager allowing creation, renaming, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Provides a full‑screen file viewer with swipe navigation, download, delete, share, and external‑open actions, plus dialogs for folder and mission moves.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a gallery of files and notes with selection, previews, long‑press actions, and viewer dialogs, loading items based on the selected folder.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with theme toggle, authentication menu, title, and a global progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a fading splash screen with an animated icon and triggers completion after a timed fade-out.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link cannot open externally, offering retry and copy‑to‑clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that triggers Internet Identity login, showing a loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Displays a full mission view with tasks, autosave, attached files and notes, and file/note viewers with fallback handling for links.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title and task list editing, including optimistic task IDs and form resets.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions view with hover and disabled styling.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen missions manager that lists missions, supports swipe actions, creation, deletion, and detail viewing.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper layout that displays children only within a mobile-focused container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog allowing selected files or notes to be moved into a chosen mission.
frontend/src/components/NotesButton.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NotesDialog.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NotesFullScreenV: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a note with actions to download, share, delete, or send it elsewhere.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog to move files or notes to a folder or back to the main collection, with performance diagnostics.
Component that enables swipe-to-reveal edit and delete actions for list rows.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Top progress bar that displays global upload progress when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Displays a full‑screen intro with a target‑themed SVG graphic and animated text, plus a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Provides a context for managing backend actor initialization with retries, error handling, and sign‑out logic.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Manages upload items with progress tracking, batching, and legacy API compatibility for files, links, and notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor via React Query, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, files, missions, and notes once when the backend actor becomes ready for faster home‑screen loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, state management, and stored‑identity restoration via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntroOnAppResume.t: Runs a callback when the app regains focus or visibility, but only after identity is initialized.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer to differentiate touch vs. mouse input.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Provides debounced autosave logic for mission title and tasks, handling mission switching and queued updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions with actor-based backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for retrieving, creating, and deleting notes, including folder and mission filtering.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for files and folders along with mutation handlers for creating folders and uploading files with concurrency limits.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Wraps browser speech recognition into a hook that exposes listening state, transcript callbacks, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables plus base layout styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main home screen with authentication checks, data fetching, UI state, and optional dev smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Centralizes actor initialization error messages and logic for classifying backend actor errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Handles opening URLs, downloading files, and sharing files or notes with fallback logic for browser restrictions.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type and provides helpers for viewer vs download behavior.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type and provides previewability checks and human-readable type labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Computes mission progress, completion state, and splits missions into completed and incomplete groups.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Performs BigInt‑safe equality comparison for task arrays by checking IDs, text, and completion flags.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Provides an opt‑in performance logging utility that measures operation durations and logs results. Includes helpers for timing async functions and tracking metadata.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs React Query mutation lifecycle events during development for debugging. Outputs timestamped console messages for start, success, error, and settled phases.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development smoke tests for core backend flows like creating folders, missions, links, and notes. Aggregates results and formats them for display.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple promise-based concurrency limiter to control parallel async operations. Manages a queue and runs tasks up to a defined concurrency limit.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters, including support for hash-based routing. Also modifies URL hash to remove sensitive params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and plugin setup. Defines design tokens and component theming via CSS variables.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Lists all frontend files included in the v114 canonical build baseline.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, versions, issues, and features; documents requirements for fixing mission task toggle UI updates and stale-state issues.
